entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Burk's Falls
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:49 a.m. EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 8.5Â°C

entry.title: Saturday: Showers at times heavy. High 11.
entry.summary: Showers at times heavy ending late this afternoon then cloudy. Amount 15 to 25 mm. Wind north 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this afternoon. High 11. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 2. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 40 percent chance of showers late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h before morning. Low plus 2. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023

entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries or rain showers changing to 40 percent chance of rain showers in the morning. Wind southwest 20 km/h. High 7. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Saturday 22 April 2023
